% https://q.uiver.app/#
\[\begin{tikzcd}
	&& {(X \times Y) \times Z} \\
	\\
	&& {(X' \times Y') \times Z'} \\
	\\
	{X'} && {Y'} && {Z'}
	\arrow["{\lambda_{X'}}"', from=3-3, to=5-1]
	\arrow["{\lambda_{Y'}}"{description}, from=3-3, to=5-3]
	\arrow["{\lambda_{Z'}}", from=3-3, to=5-5]
	\arrow["{f \circ \lambda_{X}}"', curve={height=12pt}, from=1-3, to=5-1]
	\arrow["{g \circ \lambda_{Y}}"{description, pos=0.3}, curve={height=18pt}, from=1-3, to=5-3]
	\arrow["{h \circ \lambda_{Z}}", curve={height=-12pt}, from=1-3, to=5-5]
	\arrow["{\langle f \circ \lambda_{X}, g \circ \lambda_{Y}, h \circ \lambda_{Z} \rangle}", color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=1-3, to=3-3]
\end{tikzcd}\]
